Description: The following statement contains a magic number: using (var system = ActorSystem.Create("TimeClient"))              {                  var tmp = system.ActorSelection("akka.tcp://TimeServer@localhost:9391/user/time");                  Console.Title = string.Format("TimeClient {0}"' Process.GetCurrentProcess().Id);                  var timeClient = system.ActorOf(Props.Create(() => new TimeClientActor(tmp))' "timeChecker");                      var fiber = FiberFactory.CreateFiber(3);                    while (!Program.IsShutdown)                  {                      fiber.Add(() =>                      {                          Thread.Sleep(1);                          timeClient.Tell(Time);                      });                  }                    Console.WriteLine("Connection closed.");                  fiber.GracefulShutdown(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1));                    Console.ReadLine();                  IsShutdown = true;                  Console.WriteLine("Shutting down...");                  Console.WriteLine("Terminated");              }
